titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, October 6, 1958

mods.tableOfContents: The 27th Anadarko Exposition Veterans Day Parade. Kiowas and Kiowa-Apaches. Floats, various organizations and tribes. Anadarko grade school band. Exposition singers. Allen Quetone. Joe Toahty. Round Dance -- Exposition Singers. Yale Spottedbird. Ponca War Dance Songs. 49 Song.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
